name: retronvim
description: neovim text objects from A-Z + LSP whichkey + touchcursor keyboard layout + minimal zsh/bash/git-bash setup

configurationDefaults.editor.fontFamily: 'FiraCode Nerd Font', Menlo, Monaco, 'Courier New', monospace

terminal.integrated.env.windows.WEZTERM_EXECUTABLE: yazi needs this env for images

bindings.name: brew install neovim gcc make FiraCode-NF fzf starship zsh-autosuggestions kanata git lazygit yazi

args.text: brew tap homebrew/cask-fonts && brew install neovim gcc make font-fira-code-nerd-font fzf karabiner-elements eza starship zsh-autosuggestions zsh-syntax-highlighting git lazygit yazi zoxide;

sudo curl -Lo /usr/local/bin/kanata https://github.com/jtroo/kanata/releases/download/v1.6.0-prerelease-1/kanata_macos_cmd_allowed  && sudo chmod +x /usr/local/bin/kanata && sudo /Applications/.Karabiner-VirtualHIDDevice-Manager.app/Contents/MacOS/Karabiner-VirtualHIDDevice-Manager activate

args: <cmd>lua require('vscode-neovim').notify('Relaunch vscode after finishing the installation of dependencies')<cr>

bindings.name: nixpkgs install neovim FiraCode-NF fzf blesh starship zsh-autosuggestions kanata git lazygit yazi

args.text: nix-env -iA nixpkgs.fira-code-nerdfont nixpkgs.fzf nixpkgs.blesh nixpkgs.eza nixpkgs.starship nixpkgs.zsh-autosuggestions  nixpkgs.zsh-syntax-highlighting nixpkgs.kanata nixpkgs.git nixpkgs.lazygit nixpkgs.yazi nixpkgs.zoxide;

args: <cmd>lua require('vscode-neovim').notify('Relaunch vscode after finishing the installation of dependencies')<cr>

args.text: Set-ExecutionPolicy -ExecutionPolicy RemoteSigned -Scope CurrentUser; iwr get.scoop.sh | iex

bindings.name: scoop install neovim gcc make FiraCode-NF eza starship fzf kanata git lazygit yazi zoxide

args.text: $env:PATH="$env:PATH;$HOME/scoop/shims"; scoop install git; scoop bucket add extras; scoop bucket add nerd-fonts; scoop install neovim vcredist2022 gcc make FiraCode-NF eza starship fzf kanata lazygit zoxide; scoop install yazi@0.1.5

args: <cmd>lua require('vscode-neovim').notify('Relaunch vscode after finishing the installation of dependencies')<cr>

bindings.name: Restart Retronvim (REQUIRED after installing dependencies) (windows 10/11 needs to relaunch vscode)
Enable Bash vim-mode, keyboard repeat rate, alias y=yazi vi=retronvim (relaunch terminal)

args.text: echo 'export EXA_COLORS="reset:uu=0:ur=0:uw=0:ux=0:ue=0:gu=0:gr=0:gw=0:gx=0:tr=0:tw=0:tx=0:da=0:sn=0:di=34"; alias ls="eza --all --icons --group-directories-first"; set -o vi; (xset b off r rate 210 70 2>/dev/null); export EDITOR="nvim -u ~/.vscode/extensions/yeferyv.retronvim-0.0.3/nvim/init.lua"; function vi() { $EDITOR $@; }; function y() { yazi --cwd-file=$HOME/.yazi $@; cd $(cat $HOME/.yazi); printf "\x1b[A\x1b[K"; }; source ~/.nix-profile/share/fzf/key-bindings.bash; source ~/.nix-profile/share/blesh/ble.sh; ble-face -s auto_complete fg=238; ble-face -s syntax_error fg=red; ble-face -s command_builtin fg=green; function ble/widget/normal_completion { ble/widget/auto_complete/insert; ble/widget/vi_imap/normal-mode; }; ble-bind -m auto_complete -f M-l normal_completion; ble-bind -m vi_imap -f C-n newline; ble-bind -m vi_imap -f C-m accept-line; ble-bind -m vi_imap -f C-c discard-line; ble-bind -m vi_nmap --cursor 2; ble-bind -m vi_imap --cursor 6; bleopt exec_errexit_mark=; function blerc/vim-load-hook { bleopt prompt_vi_mode_indicator= ; }; blehook/eval-after-load keymap_vi blerc/vim-load-hook; eval "$(starship init bash)"' >> ~/.bashrc;

starship config format "(\$battery)(\$sudo)(\$username)(\$directory)(\$git_branch)(\$git_status)(\$cmd_duration)(\$status)(\$character)"; starship config add_newline false; starship config command_timeout 60000; starship config cmd_duration.min_time 60000; (xset b off r rate 210 70 2>/dev/null)

args: <cmd>lua require('vscode-neovim').notify('Relaunch terminal to see the changes')<cr>

bindings.name: Enable Zsh vim-mode, keyboard repeat rate, alias y=yazi vi=retronvim (relogin if MacOS)

args.text: echo 'export EXA_COLORS="reset:uu=0:ur=0:uw=0:ux=0:ue=0:gu=0:gr=0:gw=0:gx=0:tr=0:tw=0:tx=0:da=0:sn=0:di=34"; alias ls="eza --all --icons --group-directories-first"; SAVEHIST=10000; autoload -U compinit; compinit -d ~/.cache; zstyle ":completion:*" menu select; bindkey -v; setopt interactive_comments; (xset b off r rate 210 70 2>/dev/null); export EDITOR="nvim -u ~/.vscode/extensions/yeferyv.retronvim-0.0.3/nvim/init.lua"; function vi() { eval $EDITOR $@ }; function y() { yazi --cwd-file=$HOME/.yazi $@; cd $(cat $HOME/.yazi); printf "\x1b[A\x1b[K"; }; test $NIX_PROFILES && { source ~/.nix-profile/share/zsh-autosuggestions/zsh-autosuggestions.zsh; source ~/.nix-profile/share/zsh-syntax-highlighting/zsh-syntax-highlighting.zsh; source ~/.nix-profile/share/fzf/key-bindings.zsh } || { source /usr/local/share/zsh-autosuggestions/zsh-autosuggestions.zsh; source /usr/local/share/zsh-syntax-highlighting/zsh-syntax-highlighting.zsh; source /usr/local/opt/fzf/shell/key-bindings.zsh }; eval "$(starship init zsh)"' >> ~/.zshrc;

starship config format "(\$battery)(\$sudo)(\$username)(\$directory)(\$git_branch)(\$git_status)(\$cmd_duration)(\$status)(\$character)"; starship config add_newline false; starship config command_timeout 60000; starship config cmd_duration.min_time 60000; (xset b off r rate 210 70 2>/dev/null); (brew --version 2>/dev/null && defaults write -g InitialKeyRepeat -int 10 && defaults write -g KeyRepeat -int 1)

args: <cmd>lua require('vscode-neovim').notify('Relogin if using MacOS to update keyboard repeat rate')<cr>

bindings.name: Enable Git-Bash vim-mode, keyboard repeat rate, alias y=yazi vi=retronvim (relogin to Windows)

args.text: echo 'export EXA_COLORS="reset:uu=0:ur=0:uw=0:ux=0:ue=0:gu=0:gr=0:gw=0:gx=0:tr=0:tw=0:tx=0:da=0:sn=0:di=34"; alias ls="eza --all --icons --group-directories-first"; set -o vi; export EDITOR="nvim -u ~/.vscode/extensions/yeferyv.retronvim-0.0.3/nvim/init.lua"; export LANG="en_US.UTF-8"; export USER=$USERNAME; function vi() { $EDITOR $@; }; function y() { yazi --cwd-file=$HOME/.yazi $@; cd $(cat $HOME/.yazi); printf "\x1b[A\x1b[K"; }; export PROMPT_COMMAND="history -a"; source ~/.config/fzf/key-bindings.bash; source ~/.config/ble-0.4.0-devel3/ble.sh; ble-face -s auto_complete fg=238; ble-face -s syntax_error fg=red; ble-face -s command_builtin fg=green; function ble/widget/normal_completion { ble/widget/auto_complete/insert; ble/widget/vi_imap/normal-mode; }; ble-bind -m auto_complete -f M-l normal_completion; ble-bind -m vi_imap -f @ESC vi_imap/normal-mode; ble-bind -m vi_imap -f C-n newline; ble-bind -m vi_imap -f C-m accept-line; ble-bind -m vi_imap -f C-s discard-line; ble-bind -m vi_nmap --cursor 2; ble-bind -m vi_imap --cursor 6; bleopt exec_errexit_mark=; function blerc/vim-load-hook { bleopt prompt_vi_mode_indicator= ; }; blehook/eval-after-load keymap_vi blerc/vim-load-hook; eval "$(starship init bash)"' >> ~/.bashrc;

starship config format "(\$battery)(\$sudo)(\$username)(\$directory)(\$git_branch)(\$git_status)(\$cmd_duration)(\$status)(\$character)"; starship config add_newline false; starship config command_timeout 60000; starship config cmd_duration.min_time 60000; curl -L https://raw.githubusercontent.com/junegunn/fzf/master/shell/key-bindings.bash --create-dirs --output $HOME/.config/fzf/key-bindings.bash; curl -L https://github.com/akinomyoga/ble.sh/releases/download/v0.4.0-devel3/ble-0.4.0-devel3.tar.xz | tar -xJf- --directory=$HOME/.config; set-itemproperty 'HKCU:/Control Panel/Accessibility/Keyboard Response' -Name AutoRepeatDelay  -Value 210; set-itemproperty 'HKCU:/Control Panel/Accessibility/Keyboard Response' -Name AutoRepeatRate -Value 7; set-itemproperty 'HKCU:/Control Panel/Accessibility/Keyboard Response' -Name DelayBeforeAcceptance -Value 0; set-itemproperty 'HKCU:/Control Panel/Accessibility/Keyboard Response' -Name Flags -Value 27

args: <cmd>lua require('vscode-neovim').notify('Relogin to Windows 10/11 to update keyboard repeat rate')<cr>

bindings.name: start touchcursor keyboard layout (`sudo pkill kanata` or LeftCtrl+Space+Escape to stop)

args.text: sh -c "(which scoop 2>/dev/null) && (conhost.exe --headless kanata --cfg '$HOME/.vscode/extensions/yeferyv.retronvim-0.0.3/kanata/simple.kbd' &) || { sudo --preserve-env bash --login -c 'kanata --cfg $HOME/.vscode/extensions/yeferyv.retronvim-0.0.3/kanata/simple.kbd &'; } "; sleep 5; exit;

bindings.name: Install SixelRice (terminal version of RetroNvim based on Lazyvim)

args.text: git clone --depth=1 https://github.com/yeferyv/sixelrice $(sh -c 'test $LOCALAPPDATA && echo "$LOCALAPPDATA/sixelrice" || echo "$HOME/.config/nvim"'); sh -c 'test $LOCALAPPDATA && mkdir -p $LOCALAPPDATA/nvim && cp -r $LOCALAPPDATA/sixelrice/nvim/{lua,init.lua} $LOCALAPPDATA/nvim || exit 0'

bindings.name: VSCode builtin Browser (some urls are restricted, useful for localhost)
open and export `y` command (on new terminal)

args.text: function y() { yazi --cwd-file=$HOME/.yazi "$@"; cd $(cat $HOME/.yazi); printf '\x1b[A\x1b[K'; }; y; clear
